text: Grenada was an American Thoroughbred racehorse. He won the 1880 Preakness Stakes, Belmont Stakes, and Travers Stakes. He is one of only seven horses to have won these three races. ==References== Category:1877 racehorse births Category:Racehorses bred in Kentucky Category:Racehorses trained in the United States Category:Preakness Stakes winners Category:Belmont Stakes winners Category:Thoroughbred family A20
title: Grenada (horse)
